title: Dark Divide
description: Hogwarts meets The Bourne Identity in this thrilling sequel to Desert Dark that keeps the twists and turns coming!With the trials of first semester behind her, sixteen-year-old Nadia Riley hopes to quietly rejoin her friends and complete her junior year at Desert Mountain Academy. But at a covert CIA school that trains high-achieving students for the Black-Ops, nothing stays quiet for long. In fact, the threats from first semester start haunting Nadia the minute she realizes she's being tracked on her very first survival course. Her pursuer is relentless. His agenda is frightening. And the intel he has on Nadia will put her life at risk all over again.
author: Sonja Stone
